# Headless .NET Framework

> A modern, modular .NET 10 framework for building APIs and backend services with 116+ NuGet packages organized by functional domains, featuring unopinionated design and zero lock-in architecture.

Tip: start from an `*.Abstractions` package (interfaces/contracts) and then add exactly one provider implementation (Redis/Azure/Aws/etc) as needed.

## Start Here

- [README.md](README.md): High-level overview
- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): AI/LLM guidance

## Packages

### API & Web

- [Headless.Api](./src/Headless.Api/README.md): Core ASP.NET Core API infrastructure providing service registration, middleware, security, JWT handling, and common utilities.
- [Headless.Api.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Api.Abstractions/README.md): Defines core interfaces and contracts for HTTP request context, user identity, and web client information.
- [Headless.Api.DataProtection](./src/Headless.Api.DataProtection/README.md): Extends ASP.NET Core Data Protection to persist encryption keys to blob storage providers.
- [Headless.Api.FluentValidation](./src/Headless.Api.FluentValidation/README.md): FluentValidation extensions for validating ASP.NET Core IFormFile uploads including size, content type, and file signature verification.
- [Headless.Api.Logging.Serilog](./src/Headless.Api.Logging.Serilog/README.md): Serilog integration for ASP.NET Core APIs with custom enrichers for request context.
- [Headless.Api.MinimalApi](./src/Headless.Api.MinimalApi/README.md): Framework integration for ASP.NET Core Minimal APIs with JSON configuration, validation filters, and exception handling.
- [Headless.Api.Mvc](./src/Headless.Api.Mvc/README.md): Framework integration for ASP.NET Core MVC/Web API with controllers, filters, and URL canonicalization.

### Core

- [Headless.Base](./src/Headless.Base/README.md): Foundational utility library providing extension methods, primitives, helpers, and common abstractions.
- [Headless.BuildingBlocks](./src/Headless.BuildingBlocks/README.md): Core abstractions and primitives for building domain-driven applications with multi-tenancy, user context, and cross-cutting concerns.
- [Headless.Checks](./src/Headless.Checks/README.md): Guard clause library for argument validation and defensive programming.
- [Headless.Domain](./src/Headless.Domain/README.md): Core domain-driven design abstractions including entities, aggregate roots, value objects, auditing, and messaging interfaces.
- [Headless.Domain.DistributedMessagePublisher.Cap](./src/Headless.Domain.DistributedMessagePublisher.Cap/README.md): CAP-based implementation of IDistributedMessagePublisher for reliable distributed messaging with transactional outbox.
- [Headless.Domain.LocalMessagePublisher.DI](./src/Headless.Domain.LocalMessagePublisher.DI/README.md): DI-based implementation of ILocalMessagePublisher for in-process domain event handling.

### Blob Storage

- [Headless.Blobs.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Blobs.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for blob/file storage operations across different providers.
- [Headless.Blobs.Aws](./src/Headless.Blobs.Aws/README.md): AWS S3 implementation of the IBlobStorage interface for storing files in Amazon S3.
- [Headless.Blobs.Azure](./src/Headless.Blobs.Azure/README.md): Azure Blob Storage implementation of the IBlobStorage interface.
- [Headless.Blobs.FileSystem](./src/Headless.Blobs.FileSystem/README.md): Local file system implementation of the IBlobStorage interface for development and on-premises scenarios.
- [Headless.Blobs.Redis](./src/Headless.Blobs.Redis/README.md): Redis implementation of the IBlobStorage interface for caching small blobs.
- [Headless.Blobs.SshNet](./src/Headless.Blobs.SshNet/README.md): SFTP/SSH implementation of the IBlobStorage interface for storing files on remote servers.

### Caching

- [Headless.Caching.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Caching.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified caching interface for both in-memory and distributed cache implementations.
- [Headless.Caching.Memory](./src/Headless.Caching.Memory/README.md): In-memory cache implementation for single-instance applications.
- [Headless.Caching.Redis](./src/Headless.Caching.Redis/README.md): Redis distributed cache implementation for multi-instance applications.
- [Headless.Caching.Memory](./src/Headless.Caching.Memory/README.md): Placeholder for future in-memory cache implementation.

### Email

- [Headless.Emails.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Emails.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for sending emails across different providers.
- [Headless.Emails.Core](./src/Headless.Emails.Core/README.md): Core utilities and MimeKit integration for email implementations.
- [Headless.Emails.Aws](./src/Headless.Emails.Aws/README.md): AWS SES (Simple Email Service) v2 implementation of the email sending abstraction.
- [Headless.Emails.Dev](./src/Headless.Emails.Dev/README.md): Development email implementations for local testing and debugging.
- [Headless.Emails.Mailkit](./src/Headless.Emails.Mailkit/README.md): SMTP implementation of the email abstraction using MailKit.

### Feature Management

- [Headless.Features.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Features.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for feature management and feature flags across different storage providers.
- [Headless.Features.Core](./src/Headless.Features.Core/README.md): Core implementation of feature management with caching, value providers, and definition management.
- [Headless.Features.Storage.EntityFramework](./src/Headless.Features.Storage.EntityFramework/README.md): Entity Framework Core storage implementation for feature management.

### Identity

- [Headless.Identity.Storage.EntityFramework](./src/Headless.Identity.Storage.EntityFramework/README.md): Entity Framework Core integration for ASP.NET Core Identity with framework extensions.

### Imaging

- [Headless.Imaging.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Imaging.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for image processing operations.
- [Headless.Imaging.Core](./src/Headless.Imaging.Core/README.md): Core image processing implementation with contributor-based extensibility.
- [Headless.Imaging.ImageSharp](./src/Headless.Imaging.ImageSharp/README.md): ImageSharp-based implementation for image resizing and compression.

### Logging

- [Headless.Logging.Serilog](./src/Headless.Logging.Serilog/README.md): Serilog configuration factory with sensible defaults and structured logging setup.

### Media

- [Headless.Media.Indexing.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Media.Indexing.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the interface for extracting text from media files for indexing.
- [Headless.Media.Indexing](./src/Headless.Media.Indexing/README.md): Text extraction implementations for PDF, Word, and PowerPoint documents.

### Messaging (Distributed Message Bus)

- [Headless.Messaging.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Messaging.Abstractions/README.md): Standardized interfaces for reliable distributed messaging with compile-time type safety and transactional outbox patterns.
- [Headless.Messaging.Core](./src/Headless.Messaging.Core/README.md): Foundational runtime for reliable distributed messaging with transactional outbox, automatic retries, delayed delivery, and type-safe consumer orchestration.
- [Headless.Messaging.Dashboard](./src/Headless.Messaging.Dashboard/README.md): Real-time web UI for monitoring message processing, failures, retries, and system health.
- [Headless.Messaging.Dashboard.K8s](./src/Headless.Messaging.Dashboard.K8s/README.md): Automatic discovery and monitoring of messaging nodes in Kubernetes clusters.
- [Headless.Messaging.OpenTelemetry](./src/Headless.Messaging.OpenTelemetry/README.md): Automatic tracing, metrics, and context propagation for message publishing and consumption.
- [Headless.Messaging.AwsSqs](./src/Headless.Messaging.AwsSqs/README.md): AWS SQS and SNS transport with automatic queue creation and dead-letter queues.
- [Headless.Messaging.AzureServiceBus](./src/Headless.Messaging.AzureServiceBus/README.md): Azure Service Bus transport with topics, subscriptions, and sessions.
- [Headless.Messaging.Kafka](./src/Headless.Messaging.Kafka/README.md): Apache Kafka transport with consumer groups, partitions, and exactly-once semantics.
- [Headless.Messaging.Nats](./src/Headless.Messaging.Nats/README.md): NATS with JetStream transport for cloud-native messaging.
- [Headless.Messaging.Pulsar](./src/Headless.Messaging.Pulsar/README.md): Apache Pulsar transport with geo-replication and tiered storage.
- [Headless.Messaging.RabbitMq](./src/Headless.Messaging.RabbitMq/README.md): RabbitMQ transport with exchanges, queues, and AMQP features.
- [Headless.Messaging.RedisStreams](./src/Headless.Messaging.RedisStreams/README.md): Redis Streams transport with consumer groups and at-least-once delivery.
- [Headless.Messaging.InMemoryQueue](./src/Headless.Messaging.InMemoryQueue/README.md): In-memory queue transport for local development and testing.
- [Headless.Messaging.PostgreSql](./src/Headless.Messaging.PostgreSql/README.md): PostgreSQL storage for durable, transactional message persistence.
- [Headless.Messaging.SqlServer](./src/Headless.Messaging.SqlServer/README.md): SQL Server storage for durable message persistence in Windows environments.
- [Headless.Messaging.InMemoryStorage](./src/Headless.Messaging.InMemoryStorage/README.md): Ephemeral message storage for development and testing.


### OpenAPI

- [Headless.OpenApi.Nswag](./src/Headless.OpenApi.Nswag/README.md): NSwag OpenAPI document generation with framework-specific processors and defaults.
- [Headless.OpenApi.Nswag.OData](./src/Headless.OpenApi.Nswag.OData/README.md): NSwag operation filter for OData query parameter documentation.
- [Headless.OpenApi.Scalar](./src/Headless.OpenApi.Scalar/README.md): Scalar API documentation UI integration for OpenAPI.

### ORM

- [Headless.Orm.EntityFramework](./src/Headless.Orm.EntityFramework/README.md): Entity Framework Core integration with framework conventions, global filters, and DDD support.
- [Headless.Orm.Couchbase](./src/Headless.Orm.Couchbase/README.md): Couchbase integration with bucket context and cluster management.

### Payments

- [Headless.Payments.Paymob.CashIn](./src/Headless.Payments.Paymob.CashIn/README.md): Paymob Accept integration for cash-in (payment collection) operations.
- [Headless.Payments.Paymob.CashOut](./src/Headless.Payments.Paymob.CashOut/README.md): Paymob integration for cash-out (disbursement) operations.
- [Headless.Payments.Paymob.Services](./src/Headless.Payments.Paymob.Services/README.md): Higher-level services for Paymob payment operations.

### Permissions

- [Headless.Permissions.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Permissions.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for permission management across different providers.
- [Headless.Permissions.Core](./src/Headless.Permissions.Core/README.md): Core implementation of permission management with caching, providers, and authorization.
- [Headless.Permissions.Storage.EntityFramework](./src/Headless.Permissions.Storage.EntityFramework/README.md): Entity Framework Core storage implementation for permission management.

### Push Notifications

- [Headless.PushNotifications.Abstractions](./src/Headless.PushNotifications.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for push notification services.
- [Headless.PushNotifications.Dev](./src/Headless.PushNotifications.Dev/README.md): Development push notification implementation that does nothing.
- [Headless.PushNotifications.Firebase](./src/Headless.PushNotifications.Firebase/README.md): Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) implementation for push notifications.

### Resource Locking

- [Headless.ResourceLocks.Abstractions](./src/Headless.ResourceLocks.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for distributed resource locking.
- [Headless.ResourceLocks.Core](./src/Headless.ResourceLocks.Core/README.md): Core implementation of distributed resource locking with storage abstraction.
- [Headless.ResourceLocks.Cache](./src/Headless.ResourceLocks.Cache/README.md): Cache-based resource lock storage using ICache.
- [Headless.ResourceLocks.InMemory](./src/Headless.ResourceLocks.InMemory/README.md): In-memory resource lock storage for single-instance applications and testing.
- [Headless.ResourceLocks.Redis](./src/Headless.ResourceLocks.Redis/README.md): Redis-based resource lock storage using StackExchange.Redis.

### Serialization

- [Headless.Serializer.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Serializer.Abstractions/README.md): Defines unified interfaces for serialization and deserialization.
- [Headless.Serializer.Json](./src/Headless.Serializer.Json/README.md): System.Text.Json implementation of the serializer abstractions.
- [Headless.Serializer.MessagePack](./src/Headless.Serializer.MessagePack/README.md): MessagePack binary serialization implementation.

### Settings

- [Headless.Settings.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Settings.Abstractions/README.md): Defines interfaces for dynamic application settings management.
- [Headless.Settings.Core](./src/Headless.Settings.Core/README.md): Core implementation of dynamic settings management with hierarchical value providers.
- [Headless.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework](./src/Headless.Settings.Storage.EntityFramework/README.md): Entity Framework Core storage for settings management.

### SMS

- [Headless.Sms.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Sms.Abstractions/README.md): Defines the unified interface for SMS sending.
- [Headless.Sms.Aws](./src/Headless.Sms.Aws/README.md): AWS SNS SMS implementation.
- [Headless.Sms.Cequens](./src/Headless.Sms.Cequens/README.md): Cequens SMS gateway implementation.
- [Headless.Sms.Connekio](./src/Headless.Sms.Connekio/README.md): Connekio SMS gateway implementation.
- [Headless.Sms.Dev](./src/Headless.Sms.Dev/README.md): Development SMS implementations for testing.
- [Headless.Sms.Infobip](./src/Headless.Sms.Infobip/README.md): Infobip SMS gateway implementation.
- [Headless.Sms.Twilio](./src/Headless.Sms.Twilio/README.md): Twilio SMS implementation.
- [Headless.Sms.VictoryLink](./src/Headless.Sms.VictoryLink/README.md): VictoryLink SMS gateway implementation.
- [Headless.Sms.Vodafone](./src/Headless.Sms.Vodafone/README.md): Vodafone SMS gateway implementation.

### SQL

- [Headless.Sql.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Sql.Abstractions/README.md): Defines interfaces for SQL database connection management.
- [Headless.Sql.PostgreSql](./src/Headless.Sql.PostgreSql/README.md): PostgreSQL connection factory using Npgsql.
- [Headless.Sql.SqlServer](./src/Headless.Sql.SqlServer/README.md): SQL Server connection factory using Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.
- [Headless.Sql.Sqlite](./src/Headless.Sql.Sqlite/README.md): SQLite connection factory using Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.

### Testing

- [Headless.Testing](./src/Headless.Testing/README.md): Core testing utilities and base classes for xUnit tests.
- [Headless.Testing.Testcontainers](./src/Headless.Testing.Testcontainers/README.md): Testcontainers fixtures for integration testing.

### Ticker (Background Jobs)

- [Headless.Ticker.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Ticker.Abstractions/README.md): Simple utilities for queuing and executing cron/time-based jobs in the background.
- [Headless.Ticker.Core](./src/Headless.Ticker.Core/README.md): Reliable distributed background job scheduling with cron expressions, delayed execution, and monitoring.
- [Headless.Ticker.Dashboard](./src/Headless.Ticker.Dashboard/README.md): Authentication and web UI for TickerQ background job monitoring.
- [Headless.Ticker.SourceGenerator](./src/Headless.Ticker.SourceGenerator/README.md): Compile-time code generation for TickerQ jobs marked with [TickerQ] attribute.
- [Headless.Ticker.OpenTelemetry](./src/Headless.Ticker.OpenTelemetry/README.md): OpenTelemetry tracing and metrics for TickerQ job execution.
- [Headless.Ticker.Caching.Redis](./src/Headless.Ticker.Caching.Redis/README.md): Redis-based node registry and heartbeat monitoring for multi-instance TickerQ deployments.
- [Headless.Ticker.EntityFramework](./src/Headless.Ticker.EntityFramework/README.md): Entity Framework Core persistence for TickerQ job tracking and state management.

### TUS (Resumable Uploads)

- [Headless.Tus](./src/Headless.Tus/README.md): Core TUS protocol utilities and extensions.
- [Headless.Tus.Azure](./src/Headless.Tus.Azure/README.md): Azure Blob Storage TUS store implementation.
- [Headless.Tus.ResourceLock](./src/Headless.Tus.ResourceLock/README.md): TUS file locking using Headless.ResourceLocks.

### Utilities

- [Headless.FluentValidation](./src/Headless.FluentValidation/README.md): Extension library for FluentValidation providing enterprise-grade validators and utilities.
- [Headless.Generator.Primitives](./src/Headless.Generator.Primitives/README.md): Roslyn source generator for creating strongly-typed domain primitives.
- [Headless.Generator.Primitives.Abstractions](./src/Headless.Generator.Primitives.Abstractions/README.md): Abstractions and attributes for the domain primitives source generator.
- [Headless.Hosting](./src/Headless.Hosting/README.md): Core hosting utilities and extensions for ASP.NET Core applications.
- [Headless.NetTopologySuite](./src/Headless.NetTopologySuite/README.md): NetTopologySuite extensions for geospatial operations and SQL Server geography compatibility.
- [Headless.Recaptcha](./src/Headless.Recaptcha/README.md): Google reCAPTCHA v2 and v3 integration with verification services and tag helpers.
- [Headless.Redis](./src/Headless.Redis/README.md): Redis utilities and Lua script management for StackExchange.Redis.
- [Headless.Sitemaps](./src/Headless.Sitemaps/README.md): XML sitemap generation utilities for SEO.
- [Headless.Slugs](./src/Headless.Slugs/README.md): URL-friendly slug generation from text.

## Optional

- [llms-full.txt](./llms-full.txt): Full documentation for all packages
